Title: Enacts hazing offenses and anti-hazing educational programs at educational institutions; repealer
Summary: Enacts hazing offenses and anti-hazing educational programs at educational institutions and requires educational institutions to maintain a public report on hazing violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting hazing offenses and anti-hazing educational programs at educational institutions; and to repeal certain provisions of the penal law relating thereto
